description:
Fun to paddle and easy to store. That's an inflatable kayak in a nutshell. This craft packs down small enough to store in a closet and transport in a car trunk. With a rigid keel, it's stable with efficient tracking, so you can get to the opposite shore with less effort.

  • Tough PVC-coated 1000-denier polyester with a PVC-coated drop-stitch floor insert
  • Rigid keel insert allows for efficient tracking and stability on flatwater
  • 3-chambered inflatable design is compact and easy to transport without a roof rack
  • Open cockpit has a comfortable folding seat with lots of leg room
  • Bow and stern splash covers
  • Deck bungees at the fore and aft of the cockpit
  • Interchangeable skeg plate
  • Included: pump, fin, carry bag, and repair kit
name: Star Paragon 112 Kayak with Pump
